name: CORS safelisted headers without preflight
description: Tests that safelisted headers (Content-Type: text/plain, Accept, Accept-Language) don't require preflight
notes: CORS-safelisted headers (Accept, Accept-Language, Content-Language, Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded|multipart/form-data|text/plain) don't trigger preflight. Other Content-Type values like application/json DO require preflight
